pkgmetadata.longdescription: To find out what's new in this version of MagicInvoke, please see the changelogon GitHub for 2.4.6.Welcome to MagicInvoke!=========================Magicinvoke is a Python (2.7 and 3.4+) library based on`Invoke <http://pyinvoke.org>`_.It adds ``get_params_from_ctx``, ``skippable``, and ``magictask``,as well as including a patched version of ``invoke`` with support for ``*args`` and ``**kwargs`` on tasks,some clearer exceptions, and some minor bugfixes.For docs and to see what magicinvoke has to offer you,`see here <https://magicinvoke.readthedocs.io>`_.Report issues and help out `here <https://github.com/haydenflinner/magicinvoke>`_.For getting started , we recommend you start with ``invoke``and then start mixing in ``magicinvoke`` once you feel the needfor a bit more power. See the`examples <https://magicinvoke.readthedocs.io/en/latest/#jump-in>`_page of the ``magicinvoke`` doc.
